packageRules.description: Automatically sync .nvmrc when Dockerfile Node.js version changes

commands: bash -c 'DOCKERFILE="{{{packageFile}}}"; SERVICE_DIR="{{{packageFileDir}}}"; if [ -f "$SERVICE_DIR/.nvmrc" ]; then NEW_VERSION=$(grep -E "^FROM.*node(-[a-z]+)?:" "$DOCKERFILE" | sed -E "s/.*node(-[a-z]+)?:([0-9.]+).*/\2/" | head -1); if [ ! -z "$NEW_VERSION" ] && [ "$NEW_VERSION" != "$(cat "$SERVICE_DIR/.nvmrc" | tr -d "\n\r")" ]; then echo "$NEW_VERSION" > "$SERVICE_DIR/.nvmrc" && echo "âœ“ Synced .nvmrc to $NEW_VERSION in $SERVICE_DIR" || echo "âœ— Failed to update .nvmrc in $SERVICE_DIR"; else echo "âŠ™ .nvmrc already synced ($NEW_VERSION) in $SERVICE_DIR"; fi; else echo "âŠ˜ No .nvmrc file in $SERVICE_DIR"; fi'
